Package ch.phonon

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Positionable
    This interface represents functions necessary to identify position and orientation and size of objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The Application class represents the main entrance point of the application.
    LocalOrientation
    Instances of the class LocalOrientation store information about the local orientation/position of a Drawable relative to the StarPoint.
    MainFrame
    The MainFrame is the main swing component of the application.
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the menu bar of the application.
    MainPane  
    PointInPictureBase
    Empty class, that represents the 2D vector space of the non-transformed pictures.
    ResourceLoader
    The ResourceLoader class is the central utility class collecting functions that are relevant for loading resources as pictures, videos and sounds.
    Sound
    The Sound class has several static helper functions that allow to set the default sounds of the application.
    StarPoint
    A StarPoint represents the global location of an object in reference to the global coordinate system in the pictureSystem base .
    StarPointTest  
    TEMAllied
    TEMAllied stores all information generated or related to TEM pictures loaded.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InvariantScalingType
    Drawable items can have some invariant behaviour concerning the TEMViewState.
    SoundType
    This enumeration lists all representative standard sounds that are expected to be loadable from the tar file.
    TextOrientation
    This enum is used to describe the orientation of text written to the tem view using a DrawableText object.
